description: Earlier [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) variants use a custom encryption procedure leveraging multiple mechanisms including AES with multiple rounds of Base64 encoding for its command and control communication.(Citation: Zscaler Pikabot 2023) Later [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) variants eliminate the use of AES and instead use RC4 encryption for transmitted information.(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Brett Stone-Gross & Nikolaos Pantazopoulos. (2023, May 24). Technical Analysis of Pikabot. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
